reviews.review_msg: sucks! i am sorry that there is no way one can avoid taking chem371 without having to deal with this guy! if you are involved in his class and show interest, you are screwed! GOOD LUCK!

not helpful! doesnt end up liking you too much if you are into the course and you actually wana learn something! it's good that he doesnt have an office on campus, u dont run to him often! hint: aweful marker, ALWAYS double check your exams. wonderfully crapy notes. good luck finding out what he is trying to teach!
Does not teach the course well..

NICE professor, by nice I mean good personality and clear explanation to the course content. the course is somewhat heavy and the textbook is a nightmare to follow up. Just attend the lecture and study for the notes, you should be just fine. exams are fair but require thoroughly understanding of the concept.
u can get in trouble for recording his lecture. so dont
He is a great person. However, he is too general and no idea what he is trying to focus on. Exam are extremely hard. Textbook is not easy to understood.
Could do more. Problem sets littered in errors, doesn't try to correct it which becomes terribly confusing when studying. Reads the slides. Very nice to talk to but curves the course grades down.

Great prof, no complains about this guy, always telling funny stories and related ones to the subject too. I liked his teaching method, extremely organized, only once he didn't post the notes online prior to the class, but still he did a great job. I recommend this guy very much you won't regret it as long as put some effort.
